titles.title: Recognizing and honoring the tenth anniversary of Vietnam Human Rights Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Mrs. Miller (MI) moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 613.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 5/11/2004--Passed House without amendment. States that the House of Representatives: (1) honors and recognizes the 10th anniversary of Vietnam Human Rights Day; and (2) supports the designation of a Vietnam Human Rights Day.
